headline: Universal Technical Institute, Inc. (UTI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Universal Technical Institute, Inc. on FluentInQuality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on UTI. Universal Technical Institute, Inc.’s share was trading at $23.90 as of December 1st. UTI’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.15 and 31.45 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Universal Technical Institute, Inc. (UTI) is a […]

headline: Has Atmus Filtration’s 31.2% 2025 Rally Already Priced In Its Growth Potential?
summary: If you are wondering whether Atmus Filtration Technologies at around $51 a share is still worth considering after its run up, or if you might be late to the party, this breakdown will help you evaluate whether the current price reflects the company’s fundamentals. The stock is up 6.6% over the last month and about 31.2% year to date, which indicates that investor expectations have been climbing even as short term moves have flattened out recently. Much of this optimism has been driven by...
